attributes.action: BLEND ID CARDS INTO PASSPORT/ DRIVING LICENSES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why do I need ID photos, for PASSPORT, DRIVING LICENSE AND NOW ID CARDS???? Money to update photos every 10 years for passports, driving licenses and now probably ID cards, what a rip off.

££££££ all the time for this and that.    I DO NOT AGREE WITH ID CARDS, I HAVE ID ENOUGH.  All this because the government has let too many foreigners into this country and can not control who is living here.
